# Physics Education Web App - Conservation of Energy

## Project Overview
Next.js web app for teaching HKDSE Physics conservation of energy using interactive simple pendulum simulation.

## Features
- Interactive pendulum simulation with real-time physics
- Adjustable pendulum length
- Drag to set initial height
- Visual display of kinetic and potential energy
- Pause/play controls
- Snapshot functionality for KE/PE at different times
- Multiple tabs: simulation, equations, misconceptions
- Ready for GitHub and Vercel deployment

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Canvas API for simulation

## Development Guidelines
- Keep physics calculations accurate for educational purposes
- Ensure smooth 60fps animation
- Mobile-responsive design
- Clear visual feedback for energy changes
